definition: history/annals/title of an official historian in ancient China
abbr. for 書經|书经[Shu1 jing1]

sentences.english: Some records, make up the history books of the palace.
sentences.chinese: 有些記載，彌補了史書之闕。

sentences.english: However, the most unforgettable in the history books still.
sentences.chinese: 不過，最令我難忘的還是史書。

sentences.english: Sometimes there are multiple official history of the same dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 有時一個朝代甚至會有多部官方史書。

sentences.english: History does not relate whether the priest gave him absolution .
sentences.chinese: 史書上沒有記載是否神父寬恕了他。

sentences.english: General Mirror for the Aid of Government is the first historical annals in Chinese history.
sentences.chinese: 《資治通鑑》是我國第一部編年體史書。

sentences.english: Our country the first composed the Chronicles history "age".
sentences.chinese: 編撰了我國第一部編年體史書《春秋》。

sentences.english: NO02, The history books are on the top shelf of this bookcase.
sentences.chinese: 歷史書籍在這個書櫃的上層。

sentences.english: Besides histories, we have many volumes of reminiscences, and biograph ies with number.
sentences.chinese: 除了歷史書籍外，我們還有不計其數的回憶錄和傳記。

sentences.english: The history book recorded the details of the vicissitude of times.
sentences.chinese: 這本史書詳細地記述了時代的變遷。

sentences.english: The fourth part analyses original view about the compiling of the history book.
sentences.chinese: 分析鄭樵關於史書編纂的別識心裁。

sentences.english: There are different opinions on Confucious exact birthday in the historical records.
sentences.chinese: 關於孔子的生辰，史書的記載存在着分歧。

sentences.english: Historical records, Emperor Ming Yingzong thanks to the pro-temple name "Ten Thousand Buddhas Monastery."
sentences.chinese: 史書記載明朝英宗皇帝親賜寺名“萬佛禪寺”。

sentences.english: Peng Chu industrious hands with earth-shattering volume history books.
sentences.chinese: 用勤勞的雙手捧出一卷驚天動地的史書。

sentences.english: Some of them are from history books, but most are from famous novels.
sentences.chinese: 它們有些來源於史書記載，但大部分來源於著名小說。

sentences.english: History books often seem to be invested with an air of unreality.
sentences.chinese: 史書似乎常帶有一種不真實的味道。

sentences.english: There are hundreds of other histories about dynasties and emperors.
sentences.chinese: 中國有幾百本在皇帝和王朝支持下編纂而成的史書。

definition: Records of the Grand Historian, by 司馬遷|司马迁[Si1 ma3 Qian1], first of the 24 dynastic histories 二十四史[Er4 shi2 si4 Shi3]
to do textual research/to make textual criticism/to verify by means of research (esp. historical details)/to take an exam to get a certificate (abbr. for 考取證件|考取证件[kao3 qu3 zheng4 jian4])
reference book (such as dictionary, almanac, gazetteer etc)

A Mirror for the Wise Ruler (or Comprehensive Mirror for Aid in Government), a vast chronological general history, written by 司馬光|司马光[Si1 ma3 Guang1] Sima Guang (1019-1089) and collaborators during the Northern Song in 1084, covering the period 403 BC-959 AD, 294 scrolls
